name: Alien Artifact
prompt: A VibeDeck controller as an alien biomechanical artifact, HR Giger inspired. Organic ribbed textures mixed with mechanical parts. Dark iridescent surface like beetle shells. Buttons are organic pods that look alive. The rotary knob is a spiraling shell-like growth. Tubes and tendons connecting parts. Unsettling but beautiful. Bioluminescent accents. The LCD shows alien symbols. Dark atmospheric lighting with rim light.
